name: Purrgatory High School
description:
It’s the first day of High School for Death, and cherry blossoms are in the air - the perfect day for a cat-pocalypse! Explosive monster-fighting awaits this teenage reaper as she - armed with her trusty flamethrower - explores the depths of a technicolour high school to save her Grandma!

Credits:

Production: Calitess

Story and Dialogue: ThornSquiggles

Programming: Calitess

Level Design: ThornSquiggles, Galen Qiu

Audio Design: ThornSquiggles, Calitess

Art and Illustration: Deiimonde, Fushiginek0

Sprite Animation: Fushiginek0

Original Soundtack: Jackson Fumberger
